en.content: You are drawn to a small book of strange poetry bound in black, published in Boston in 1919. The cover reads Azathoth and Others, by Edward Derby. Unlike most of the other books, you can pocket the Derby book if you want.

text.content: The Derby volume will require about a week of study to fully comprehend. If you survive this adventure, there will be a special option to offer you more information about it.

zh.content: 你被一本小开本、黑封面的奇怪诗集吸引了。它的封面写着《阿撒托斯及其他》，作者是爱德华·德比，1919年在波士顿出版。和其他的书不同，这本书你可以随身携带。

text.content: 德比的诗集需要研读约一星期才能完全掌握。如果你度过此次冒险，会有特殊选项允许你阅读，得到关于它的更多信息。
